title: nandagOpAla mukunda
sahitya:
nandagOpAla mukunda gOkula nandana yamunA tIra vihAra


anupallavi

 mandara giridhara mAmava mAdhava muraLIdhara madhusUdana harE


caraNam   mandahAsa vadana manjuLa caraNa aravinda lOcana Ashrita rakSaNa 
pItAmbaradhara pannaga shayana kali kalmaSa haraNa karuNApUraNa 
vandita munibrnda guruguhAnanda vaikuNTha sthitAnanda kanda 
gOvarddhanOddhara gOpa strIjAra gOvinda
